column2: Aha! So you finally arrive! I was worried you'd have run to the next town.
Wouldn't miss going against you for the world.
I wouldn't miss you either. My aim is too good to miss you.
Go on ahead and laugh, while you still have lungs.
Heheheeheh! How do you plan to beat me? You don't even have a weapon!
I found a sword in the garbage. The Sword Swallow must've chucked it out.
N-n-nothing. Saay, how about, uh, a snack?
Never mind the details! This cake... it's to die for!
Oh, you know. Flour, sugar, almond butter, vanilla, poison, eggs...
Oh, I can stand the poison. The slop the boss feeds me is worse. But almonds... I have allergies.
Uh... that's what I meant! Almonds, fool! See you at the big top!
Whaaa? I did no such thing! Pretty please, with a cherry on top?
More like skull and crossbones on top.
Oh, that? That's just the garnishing. Come on.
Fine! See you at the big top!
Oh, come on! Just look at it! It's so good. It's got icing, and chocolate..
Almond butter, too! That's.. the best...
Yeah, that was gooo... uh oh.
Ooh... ow ow ow. Uh, I'll just see you at the big top. Oooooohhhhh.....
